content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 82.4 - Form for counties

State Regulations

The form to be used in the computation of the
constitutional tax limit of counties shall be as follows: Image
________
Form was amended to change Comptroller's address by adding
110 State Street and the suffix 0001 to the zip code. Form was unavailable at
time of publication. Image
